text: @JoeBiden As a concerned Canadian citizen... Can you please beat that over inflated Pumpkin of a candidate? Shows no concern or remorse for the unthinkable Covid-19 situation. He has only been about himself and will be remembered as a tyrannical cynical President. #Biden2020Landslide
